description_txt: stated on April 30, 2012 in an op-ed published on NorthJersey.com:
quote_txt: Says Rep. Paul Ryan’s budget proposal "would effectively double the interest paid out on existing and future student loans."

description_txt: stated on April 16, 2012 in an interview about his city budget proposal.:
quote_txt: "We will not ask for a tax increase to run city government."

description_txt: stated on April 16, 2012 in a speech on the floor of the U.S. Senate:
quote_txt: "If you put the $47 billion in revenue (raised over 10 years by the Buffett rule) into infrastructure you could create 611,000 infrastructure jobs."
footer: By C. Eugene Emery Jr. • May 6, 2012

description_txt: stated on April 30, 2012 in a debate:
quote_txt: Says "I never billed a single hour of my time to the City of Portland in the last 10 years -- so, no revolving door."

description_txt: stated on April 30, 2012 in a debate:
quote_txt: Says the mayor’s job "is to make sure that if somebody is trying to build a set of water treatment plants to cure us from cryptosporidium we don’t have, we don't say yes even if CH2M Hill wants us to."

description_txt: stated on April 30, 2012 in a debate :
quote_txt: Says we could have saved ourselves the cost of building the Powell Butte water reservoir.

quote_txt: Says  "I don’t agree with Mr. Hales that we should give a sweeping break to the developers to allow them to build that infill housing without paying for those very basics."

quote_txt: Says President Barack Obama "added" $6.5 trillion to the national debt in his first term, more than the $6.3 trillion added by the previous 43 presidents combined.

quote_txt: "When housing and transportation costs are combined, Atlanta’s cost of living -- typically perceived as relatively low -- ranks as 7th worst out of 51 metros nationally."

quote_txt: Says the oil industry subsidies that President Barack Obama is attacking don’t exist

quote_txt: Since 2009, the Ohio Republican Party has made more contacts with voters — nearly 6.6 million — than any other GOP state organization in the nation.
